section.title:
purchase requests by planner code
planner codes purchase requests for Purchase Requests by Planner Code
section.para: To view purchase requests by planner code or to create new manual purchase requests, go to Purchase > Purchase Requests > by Planner Code. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Purchase requests are considered to be a valid source of supply by the planning systems.

tip.para: Use the NEW button to create a manual purchase request. Or use the right-click option on the Inventory Availability and Planned Order screens.

section.para: When displaying purchase requests by planner code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display purchase requests for all planner codes.
Specify planner code whose purchase requests you want to display.
Enter a planner code pattern to select a range of planner codes. Refine your search using regular expressions.

note.para: Purchase request quantities are based on the inventory unit of measure (UOM). However, some vendor item sources may specify an alternate UOM. If this is the case, the system will automatically convert the requirement to the vendor's UOM when the purchase request is released.

listitem.para: Select to display purchase requests by planner code for all sites.
Specify site whose purchase requests by planner code you want to display.
Purchase requests by planner code entered on and after this date will be displayed.
Purchase requests by planner code entered on and before this date will be displayed.
Select to force the results to be sorted by vendor.

Display lists purchase requests for the specified planner code, using the specified parameters. You may multi-select purchase requests in the list, but when doing so each request will be processed individually.

note.para: When a purchase request is released, the requested item will automatically populate a Purchase Order Item screen. If item sources have been defined for the item, then item source prices will be usedâ€”that is, unless the vendor price has been specifically overridden for purchase requests generated from sales orders. Project numbers may also be transferred from sales orders. In this way, sales orders and purchase order line items may be linked to the same project.
